_meanings:
{@--2@} Not 
compliant or docile, disobedient, 
selfwilled; {#strI cAvaSA#} <ls>Pt. 1. 424</ls>;  
<ls>Ms. 5. 33.</ls>

{@--4@} Not
master of oneself, subject to the
senses; {#kamaparamavaSaM na viprakuryuH#}  
<ls>Ku. 6. 95.</ls>

{@--6@} Necessary, certain; {#kimasya#} 
{#Bavato yaTA suhfda eva nASo'vaSaH#} <ls>Mu. 6.</ls>

whose
mind and senses are not held in
subjection.
